mapper.insert: insert into holiday (`Day`, IsHoliday, NextHoliday, DayType) values (#{day,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isholiday,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{nextholiday,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{daytype,jdbcType=OTHER})
